FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Echo of the MSG-ID field from the Replay Telemetry Request message.

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the request being processed. (1: Acknowledgement, 2: Working/Keep Alive, 3: Successful completion, 4: Failed completion, 5: Invalid Request, 6: Final Message)

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the request

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Useful to provide function call status or error code in the case of failed completion

FIELD.NAME: DATA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Additional data that may be desired along with the completion status. Type is dependent upon response.
